question:
You are applying for a job and need a refernce.Write a letter to the boss in your former job.


In  your letter :


Give details of the job
Explain why it is important to you
Suggest what information your ex boss could put in the reference.
text: I am writing to take your favour for my new job.Since my new company requires a reference from my previous organisation.

This new post is for a Senior Analyst at  Google.This work demands me to analyse the company's data and make a report of it.I will have a professional team  who will collect the data online and assist me to analyze it.

I always wanted to work with this venture. It is an immense opportunity for me because it will enhance my skills and experience working in a multinational company. It will certainly be beneficial for my career.

I would sincerely request you for giving your reference based on my previous record.Kindly, mention my positive attitude and quick learning abilities in it.Since  I was the star performer of our organisation ,therefore, it is my humble request to mention  my achievements too.
I am having high hopes for you and would be grateful for this generosity.
